SEARCH
Package handlers

Class StaffHandler

java.lang.Object
handlers.StaffHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
AccountSaver
public class StaffHandler extends Object implements AccountSaver
Handles operations related to managing staff data, such as loading, saving, adding, and removing staff members. Implements the AccountSaver interface to facilitate account saving functionality.
